text:
@SteveGuest @realDonaldTrump #JoeByeDon makes gaffes. So what? He doesn’t lie
Doesn’t claim hydoxychlorquine prevents the Corona virus
Doesn’t hold rallies during pandemic and thus causing greater chance of increased Covid-19 cases
Doesn’t drink water with 2 hands

BIDEN IS A PROVEN LEASER
